original_text: I will bring you back from the nations where I sent you to live. I will bring you back from all those different places. I will use my great power to do this and you will know that I am very angry with you.
korean_text: 능한 손과 편 팔로 분노를 쏟아 너희를 여러 나라에서 나오게 하며 너희의 흩어진 여러 지방에서 모아내고

sentences.original_text: I will bring you back from the nations
where I sent you to live
I will bring you back from all those different places
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 그 모든 다른 곳들에게서 데려오리라

sentences.original_text: I will use my great power to do this
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이것을 하기 위해 나의 큰 권능을 사용하리라

sentences.original_text: that I am very angry with you
